about_the_game:
In a world where crystals embody the essence of life, you emerge from the chasm as an inorganic, crystalline creature. Your survival hinges on combating an ancient, corrupting force rising from the abyss. This dark power transforms crystals into formidable foes, fueling your perpetual struggle for survival. As you delve deeper, the threats intensify, along with the risk of being consumed. Gather crystals to extract their magical essence, upgrade your abilities, and fight back against the darkness to uncover its source.

MINE TO EVOLVE

  • Collect crystals up to your carrying capacity and deposit them into the mystical tree atop the mine.

  • Enhance your crystalline form to increase your capacity and resilience.

  • Begin your journey with a pickaxe. Upgrade your tools over time to more powerful equipment like mining lasers, allowing for more efficient mining and better defense against the mine's threats.

STRATEGY AND RESOURCE MANAGEMENT

  • Balance risk versus reward to decide when to ascend and how deep to journey.

  • The deeper you descend, the more magic is required to keep the corruption under control.

REPLAYABILITY

  • Explore procedurally generated mines where each run offers new layouts, challenges, and opportunities.

ENEMIES

  • Crystals transform into specific enemies based on their value.

  • Enemies have different priorities, such as consuming crystals before hunting down the player.

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Discrete Non Mobile GPU with 1 GB Ram

short_description: Descend into a living, ever-changing mine in this action roguelike! Gather crystals to extract their magical essence, manage resources, upgrade your abilities, and fight back against the encroaching darkness to uncover its source—before it consumes you.
